attributes.review: I was exploring the nearby cave for some great material to built a new statue for our wondrous god we have as president, when I saw him sitting there. The man stared into the lake in the cave and started chanting a sacred tongue. I spoke with such kindness, letting him know how great he is. Suddenly, his head did a 360 and a bit more like an owl so that he could make eye contact. Afterwards, he jumped into an air current which sent him out of the cave with his bat like wings. After I got this app, I can now track where this cryptic man is at any given moment. Will be using it at all times.
attributes.title: The Man, The Myth, The Legend
